item.name: put_products

exec: pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("you must at least enter one field to change");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no product with this id");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("in_stock can not be converted to boolean");
"you can not change this product, because you are not the one who created it"

item.description: this is the end point of editing a product

item.name: delete_products

exec: pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no product with this id");
"you can not delete this product, because you are not the one who created it");

item.description: this endpoint will delete the product with the given id

exec: pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no order with this id");
"you can not edit this order, because you are not the one who created it");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no order with this id");
"you can not delete this order, because you are not the one who created it");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("img can not be converted to base64");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("img length can not be less than 4 characters");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no image with this id");
"you can not change this image, because you are not the one who created it");
pm.expect(responseJson.description).to.eql("there is no image with this id");
"you can not delete this image, because you are not the one who created it");
